message: This offer reflects the diminishing value of money with each round. I propose we split it 70/30 in your favor.
This offer reflects the current value of the money. I am taking a slight advantage in this round, but I believe it's fair considering the next round's inflation will further reduce your share.
Considering the inflation effect on the value of money, I propose we split it 45/55. This maintains a balance between our shares while accounting for the diminishing value.
